snippet: Joel Babbit of the Mother Nature Network says bosses could learn much from James Bond, who always enjoyed himself while “working on very serious stuff like saving the world.”
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Mother Nature Network chief executive Joel Babbit discussing his career and management technique.
lead_paragraph: Joel Babbit of the Mother Nature Network says bosses could learn much from James Bond, who always enjoyed himself while “working on very serious stuff like saving the world.”

headline.seo: Joel Babbit of MNN, on James Bond’s Lesson for C.E.O.’s
headline.main: Why C.E.O.’s Need a Dose of James Bond
headline.print_headline: Why C.E.O.’s Need a Dose of James Bond
